title: Oscars 2017: Live from the red carpet
text: Oscars 2017: Live from the red carpet Lights! Camera! Action! The earlybirds are arriving at the Oscars right now. Here TV personality Giuliana Rancic shows off her lavender gown. Post to Facebook Oscars 2017: Live from the red carpet Lights! Camera! Action! The earlybirds are arriving at the Oscars right now. Here TV personality Giuliana Rancic shows off her lavender gown.  //usat.ly/2msSQop   Oscars 2017: Live from the red carpet None Lights! Camera! Action! The earlybirds are arriving at the Oscars right now. Here TV personality Giuliana Rancic shows off her lavender gown. Steve Granitz, WireImage
